entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

More info: Writing

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

about me

I am Yuyang Zhu, an undergraduate student with a strong passion for artificial intelligence, particularly in areas like Embodied AI and 3D detection. My research interests lie in exploring intelligent systems that bridge perception, reasoning, and action, with a focus on real-world applications. I am actively seeking internship opportunities to deepen my knowledge and gain hands-on experience in these fields. Looking ahead, I aspire to pursue a Ph.D. to contribute to the advancement of AI technologies and their impact on society.
